description: The library has a collection of over 1,62,045 Volumes and 52,089 Titles of Text Books, Reference Books, Directories, Yearbooks, Biographical sources, Humanities, Abstracts, Literature, and Management. The library has an amazingly rich collection of Thesis, Dissertations, Encyclopedias, and General books including Kannada & English novels. Collections of books, and CDs/DVDs in the IAS corner.
Monday to Saturday 8:00 AM to 08:00 PM (Depending on the students' requirements, the above timings are extended during examination time.)

This Seminar Hall is a versatile space tailored for various educational and professional events, including seminars, guest lectures, and workshops. With a capacity to accommodate a large audience, the hall is designed to foster an interactive learning environment. Flexible seating that can be configured to suit different types of events, ensuring comfort and engagement for all attendees. Equipped with state-of-the-art audio-visual technology, including projectors, microphones, and sound systems to enhance presentations and discussions.

A spacious and well-equipped venue designed for academic and professional gatherings. It can accommodate a significant number of attendees, making it ideal for lectures, workshops, and conferences. The hall features comfortable seating, advanced audio-visual equipment, and high-speed internet connectivity, ensuring an engaging and interactive experience for participants.
